text: "London Bridge" is the debut single recorded by American singer and rapper Fergie. It was on her debut studio album, The Dutchess (2006). It was written by Fergie, Mike Hartnett, Sean Garrett, and producer Polow da Don. ==Track listing== * Digital single # "London Bridge" (Single Version) — 3:28 * UK CD single # "London Bridge" (album version) — 4:01 # "London Bridge" (instrumental) — 3:25 * Australian CD single # "London Bridge" (album version) — 4:01 # "London Bridge" (instrumental) — 3:27 # "London Bridge" (a cappella) — 3:18 # "London Bridge" (video version) — 3:31 ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== Chart (2006) Peak position Canada (Hot Canadian Digital Songs) 2 Greece (IFPI) 9 ===Year-end charts=== Chart (2006) Position Australia (ARIA) 27 Austria (Ö3 Austria Top 40) 62 Belgium (Ultratop 50 Flanders) 91 CIS (Tophit) 172 Germany (Official German Charts) 52 Sweden (Sverigetopplistan) 85 Switzerland (Schweizer Hitparade) 74 US Billboard Hot 100 22 ==Certifications== ==Release history== Region Date Format Ref.
